name: call of impossible contract mission killer duty
name_original: call of impossible contract mission killer duty
description:
call of impossible contract mission killer duty

Sniper Shoot War is a first-person 3D shooter game. You will play as a sniper special, strike terrorists. Your task is to fight against terrorists bases and destroy X City terrorist remnants, to effectively combat terrorist activities.

Realistic gaming sound effects, so you have a more perfect more realistic sniper experience. You will be a true sharpshooter!
The game has a ranking function, you and your friends can compare who is the real master sniper. Invite your friends together game, right? It will be very interesting.

In the application you will see - the city , the ruined city , the war , sharpshooter scope , killer rifle , highlight, the ruins of the city .
Simple operation of the game: Slide the left of the screen to control character movement, slide to the right of the screen you can adjust the target. You can use the sniper rifle zoom lens, adjust the amplification factor by the right side of the slider.

key features:

=> Excellent city 3D environment
=> First person Shooting
=> Sniper scope view
=> Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation!
=> Full addictive control of latest shooting sniper rifle
